name: Adventure of Nick
description:
Isn't it great to play a platformer? Jumping on cute enemies, collecting coins, and all that. But sometimes, you want something more, like taking a boat to the city of the dead or explore a fallen spaceship or just ride on an angry cloud. Then it's a game for you! Explore an island full of wonderful creatures that want you dead, find powerful artifacts or apples, they are good too. So let's go to the numbers:  50+ levels, 20+bosses, and 2 player mode.

The story is short: There are 5 princesses, they were captured, save them. It's enough motivation to start crushing everything, but is it? So start your own adventure!

(Game is free until 01.03.21)
